name: Withering Hour
description:
"How can I make things normal again" 

"Will the spring continue or the trees wither away"

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Withering Hour is a small prototype visual novel (my first project ) in which there are different scenarios and choices to progress the story. Intearct and learn about the different personality in this fictional world.

Delve in the visual novel with loveable characters, professional voice acting, wonderful environment and exciting twists. 

The project is still in development and further work will be published depending upon the support and reviews from the community.

Duration: 30 minutes of reading (This project is a backstory of the main protagonist before the incident occurs – the prequel to the original story)

Instructions: Click on the screen button Under the dialogue box for Full Screen.

Note: Web play is experimental. To avoid any bugs please download the game.
